text:
🌤️The Water Promenade is a tranquil space along the scenic Pond's water edge near the Park's Entrance Plaza.
🪑🪑🪑It is lined with sturdy benches where one can rest and take in the scenic tranquil sight.
🌳🌳A row of majestic Rain Trees shades the Promenade from the midday sun.
🌅It's a beautiful sight to behold with the morning sunray lighting up the still tranquil Pond.
